sharePanel.title:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the testimonial sharing panel
**UI Location**: Testimonial Modal (share panel header)
**When Users See This**: When a testimonial is displayed and the user is offered to share it
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Share your testimonial with the world"
sharePanel.shareTitle:
**Functional Purpose**: Title used when sharing the testimonial link
**UI Location**: Testimonial Modal (share panel link title)
**When Users See This**: When the user clicks to share the testimonial on various platforms
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "View this testimonial on Exercism"
